q: As Michael Davis sees it, The News has a vendetta against Caraway because the paper didn't like the positions that the mayor pro tem took on last year's property tax hike. : The winner of X Factor will be awarded$ 5 million record deal, the largest guaranteed prize in TV history. The good news is people are still excited about these shows- Idol, Dancing with the Stars, America's Got Talent- people, thank god, still like these shows and that gives me confidence for when we launch ours[ in the fall].
